name: priority-slots
description: Reserve some of the slots in your server for players with priority roles.
author: voximity

slots.description: The number of slots to reserve as priority.

message.description: The message to be displayed when someone is prevented from joining.
message.default: Sorry, but {} of the slots on this server are reserved for priority players.

roles.description: The roles that are considered priority players.

only_if_slots_unfilled.description: Kick players only when the staff slots are unfilled, as opposed to always.
